headline: How the Story Behind BD Is Evolving After Analyst Downgrades and New Developments
summary: Becton Dickinson's consensus analyst price target has recently been revised downward, dropping from $206.58 to $201.49 in response to ongoing changes in the company's outlook. This adjustment reflects the evolving mix of optimism and caution among analysts, who are weighing the implications of updated forward guidance and sector challenges. Stay tuned to discover how you can monitor and interpret these shifts in the stock's narrative going forward. Stay updated as the Fair Value for Becton...
